name: Bosch's Damnation
description: In 1994, the Swedish engineer, entrepreneur and adventurer Malte Stierngranat was buried in a pyramid that he had designed himself. Carol is contacted by the cleaner George in the middle of a cold Swedish winter. This leads her on a journey in which she has to delve into Malte Stierngranat's illustrious life and his legacy.
minimum_requirements: OS: 98, XP, Vista, 7 or 8 Processor: Pentium 1000 or better Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: 16 MB Video Card Storage: 800 MB available space
